hopobject.name: U-Boot (V1)
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; U; Linux i686; en-US; rv:1.9.0.5) Gecko/2008120121 Firefox/3.0.5
hopobject.body:
This project supports U-Boot boot loader for BeagleBoard. While basic OMAP3 support is available in U-Boot mainline, recent developer version with latest fixes and features is available from
http://gitorious.org/projects/u-boot-omap3/repos/mainline/logs/omap3-dev
hopobject.shortdesc: Maintain U-Boot (V1) for Beagle. Fix bugs, integrate new features and support mainline.
